definitions.definition: any salt of chromic acid ; in solution the yellow chromate anion (CrO 4 ) is in equilibrium with the orange dichromate anion (Cr 2 O 7 ), the relative amount of each ion depending on the pH ; they are both very powerful oxidizing agents

main_definition: ( inorganic chemistry ) any salt of chromic acid ; in solution the yellow chromate anion (CrO 4 ) is in equilibrium with the orange dichromate anion (Cr 2 O 7 ), the relative amount of each ion depending on the pH ; they are both very powerful oxidizing agents
